Spells:
Chill Touch (K0 Necr): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 4d8 HP necrotic, undead also suffer Disadv on self attack for 1 rd
Cone Of Cold (K5 [The Fathomless] Evoc): 60' cone inflicts 8d8 HP cold (Con half)
Detect Poison And Disease (C1 Divi): R30' Self senses poison for conc or 10 min
Eldritch Blast (K0 Evoc): R120' Ranged spell creates 4 rays that inflict 1d10 HP force each
Friends (K0 Ench): Self gains on Adv on Cha checks w/target for conc or 1 min
Hold Monster (K5 Ench): R90' Immobilizes target (Wis neg) for conc or 1 min

Poison Spray (K0 Conj): R10' Target suffers 4d12 HP poison (Con neg)

Magic Notes:
Eldritch Invocations: Select 8
Magic Initiate (Cleric): Know 2 C0 spells, cast 1 C1/long rest
Bond Of The Talisman: Self or talisman wearer teleport to each other 6/long rest
Eldritch Master: Regain spells from patron 1/long rest
Eldritch Mind: Adv on Con saves to maintain concentration
Far Scribe: Cast Sending to 6 targets whose names are written in Book Of Shadows
Fathomless Plunge: R30' Teleport self and 5 willing targets 1 mile to body of water 1/short rest
Genie's Vessel: Retreat into vessel for 12 hr 1/long rest, inflict +6 HP cold 1/rd
Gift Of The Protectors: Target whose name is written in Book Of Shadows retains 1 HP when reduced to 0 HP 1/long rest
Grasping Tentacles: Cast Evard's Black Tentacles w/unbreakable concentration and gain 20 temporary HP 1/long rest
Guardian Coil: Use Reaction to use Tentacle Of The Deeps to reduce damage by 2d8
Investment Of The Chain Master: Familiar inflicts DC 16 saves and gains 40' fly or swim and magical attacks; self can command familiar to attack and can use Reaction to give it resistance to damage
Limited Wish: Gain 6th level spell effects 1d4/long rest
Mystic Arcanum: Use K6, K7, K8, K9 spells 1/long rest
Pact Of The Chain: Know Find Familiar, forego one attack for familiar attack
Pact Of The Tome: Gain Book Of Shadows w/3 cantrips
Protection Of The Talisman: Talisman wearer gains +1d4 saving throw 6/long rest
Rebuke Of The Talisman: R30' Use Reaction to inflict 6 HP psychic and 10' push on attacker when talisman wearer hit
Sanctuary Vessel: R30' Take 5 willing into vessel, 10 min gives short rest and +6 HP regained
Tentacle Of The Deeps: R60' 10' tentacle inflicts 2d8 HP cold and -10' speed 2/rd for 1 min 6/long rest
Undying Servitude: Cast Animate Dead 1/long rest
